title: Matthieu Hanf
text:
> PACKAGES




Here are some 
R packages that I maintain.


> I like to construct

Shiny

packages that facilitate the design of 
Apps ready for production 
(and maximize time for Data Science & Research)











> SHINYRATING










R package that allows to create advanced rating inputs in Shiny



Open


















> SHINYFRIENDLYCAPTCHA










R package that provides a GDPR compliant Captcha to Shiny (Friendly Captcha)



Open



















> INTERFACER










R package to simplify the development, layout, theme design and deployment of complex web forms using Shiny



Private


















> AUTHENTIFIER










R package that adds a simple, strong or openID authentication layer as well as a user account management toolbar to Shiny apps.



Private


















> SHINYLEMONPIE










R package that provides a GDPR compliant cookies manager to Shiny (tarteaucitron)



Open
















 2024 | 
Matthieu Hanf
 | 
MIT License

title: Matthieu Hanf
text:
> SUMMARY




I'm currently
Head of Data at

Sesan

(eHealth NPO)

> Data Warehouse, Prediction Model & DataViz for health professionals & patients

I'm also a 

Research Associate at 
Inserm


> Statistics & Epidemiolgy

I like to code
during my free time

> R, Python and others languages related to Data Science











> EDUCATION






University of Versailles Saint Quentin
> Accreditation to supervise research (HDR)





Paris, France
2017






University of French Antilles and Guyana
> PhD in epidemiology





Cayenne, Fr. Guyana
2011






AgroPariTech
> MSc in life and environmental sciences





Paris, France
2006






University of Paris-Sud 11
> MSc in stochastic and statistical Modeling





Paris, France
2006

title: Matthieu Hanf
text:
> HELLO WORLD !




Hi, my name is 
Matthieu Hanf.


> I'm passionnate about 
Health Data Science.


> I like to design tools from data that 
make insights for health professionals & patients.


> I live in Paris with 
my family.


For more :

> 
About
> 
Publications
> 
Projects












> PICTURE















> CONTACT




I will be
glad to hear from you.

> You can find me elsewhere.














 2024 | 
Matthieu Hanf
 | 
MIT License
